DOC.brief_title: Study To Assess The Impact Of Hepatic Impairment On The Safety , Tolerability And Pharmacokinetics Of Single-Dose 200 Mg Of PF-868554
DOC.criteria: Male female subject nonchildbearing potential age 18 62 year age , inclusive ; Body Mass Index ( BMI ) approximately 18 35 kg/m2 ; total body weigh > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) ; Subjects Class C classification ( Severe ChildPugh Scores great 10 ) ; Severe ascites and/or pleural effusion ; Had transplant kidney , heart liver ;
